name: 100+ Notion Shortcuts Cheatsheet
description: 100+ Notion Shortcuts CheatsheetNotion is fully equipped with keyboard and Markdown shortcuts so you can do everything you need without using your mouse.This template contains over more than 100 shortcuts for Notion. The shortcuts have been grouped into categories according to usage. I have created this template with Notion beginners in mind, so it is easy and intuitive to use for everyone.Try it out for yourself and see the difference it can make in your Notion productivity.Click "I want this"

overview: The 100+ Notion Shortcuts Cheatsheet is a comprehensive reference guide designed to dramatically improve your Notion productivity. This free template contains over 100 carefully organized keyboard and Markdown shortcuts that eliminate the need for constant mouse usage, allowing you to navigate and create content in Notion at lightning speed.

Built specifically with Notion beginners in mind, this cheatsheet organizes shortcuts into logical categories based on usage patterns. Whether you're formatting text, creating blocks, navigating pages, or managing databases, you'll find the exact shortcut you need organized in an intuitive, easy-to-reference structure.

Available as a completely free resource, this template delivers exceptional value for anyone looking to master Notion's keyboard shortcuts. The organized categorization makes it simple to learn shortcuts progressively, helping you transition from mouse-dependent workflows to keyboard-driven efficiency.

faqs.question: Do I need a paid Notion account to use this cheatsheet?
faqs.answer: No, this template works perfectly with a free Notion account. Simply duplicate it to your workspace and keep it open for reference whenever you need to look up a shortcut.

faqs.question: Will these shortcuts work on both Mac and Windows?
faqs.answer: The cheatsheet includes shortcuts for both operating systems. Notion shortcuts use Cmd on Mac and Ctrl on Windows, and the template accounts for these differences.

faqs.question: How quickly can I learn all these shortcuts?
faqs.answer: You don't need to memorize all shortcuts at once. Start with the most common ones you'll use daily, and gradually expand your knowledge. Most users see significant productivity gains within the first week.

faqs.question: Can I customize or add my own shortcuts to this template?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Since this is a Notion template, you can fully customize it. Add notes, highlight your favorite shortcuts, or reorganize categories to match your workflow preferences.
